title: Decline Of Stock Price As An Asset With Allan Rewak, Emerald Health Therapeutics
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Allan Rewak is vice president, communications and stakeholder relations at Emerald Health Therapeutics. Prior to joining Emerald, Allan was the inaugural executive director of the Cannabis Council of Canada where he played a key role in Canada legalizing cannabis. He joins Rena Sherbill to discuss whether further consolidation is ahead, how the US is unique in the cannabis world, and why investors shouldn't be overly exuberant. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
